availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David Pliney Robb (Versailles, Woodford Co, KY, banker)

body.p: Versailles Kentucky, police judge, clerk and merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph Robb and Rebecca Robb. Married to Cynthia I. Hilber Robb in Bourbon County on April 6, 1854. Clerk in Lewis County in 1850. Boot and shoe merchant in Versailles in 1860. Police judge in Woodford County in 1861. County court clerk in Woodford County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 2, p. 183A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, Versailles, p. 825.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, Versailles, p. 519A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bourbon County Marriages, Film #000183145, p. 274.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 7th Congressional District, Vol. 1, July 1863, p. 210, (Accessed via ancestry.com on March 13, 2020).
Find A Grave, "David Pliney Robb (1831-1907)," Memorial 196135299, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/196135299 (accessed March 13, 2020).
